remarks: 2-variable restricted specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jun-2014.)
statement:
rspc2v.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
rspc2v.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
rspc2va $p |- ( ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) /\ A. x e. C A. y e. D ph ) -> ps ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x $.
$d D x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps y $.
